wikipedia_page.main: Tommy Clay (19 November 1892 – 21 February 1949) was a professional footballer who played fullback for Leicester Fosse (the original name for Leicester City), Tottenham Hotspur and England during the 1910s and 1920s.

response: *1892 – Thomas Clay, English footballer and coach (d. 1949)
